dakṣiṇe prokṣaṇī pātram ādhāya adbhiḥ prapūrayet
kiñcid arghya ambu saṃgṛhya prokṣaṇī ambhasi yojayet
arghyasya uttaratas kāryyam pādyam ācamanīyakam
ātmānam yāga vastūni maṇḍalam prokṣayet guruḥ
prokṣaṇī pātra toyena manunā anyat api kramāt
nyāsa krameṇa dehe sve dharma ādīn pūjayet tatas
puṣpa ādyaiḥ pīṭha manu antam tasmin ca para devatām
pañca kṛtvas punar kuryyāt puṣpa añjalim an anya dhīḥ
vinā naivedyam gandha ādyaiḥ upacāraiḥ samarccayet
guru upadiṣṭa vidhinā śeṣam anyat samāpayet
sarvam etat prayuñjīta prokṣaṇī sthena vāriṇā
visṛjya toyam prokṣaṇyāḥ pūrayet tat yathā purā
tatas tat maṇḍalam mantrī gandha ādyaiḥ sādhu pūjayet
śālibhiḥ karṇikā madhyam āpūryya upari taṇḍulaiḥ
alaṅkṛtya punar teṣu darbhān āstīryya mantra vid
kūrccam akṣata saṃyuktam nyaset teṣām atha upari
pūrayet karṇikām pūrvam śālibhiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ tatas
darbhān nyaset upari eṣām sa akṣatam kūrccakam tatas
chinna mūlāḥ kuśāḥ dīrghāḥ saptaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ
brahmagranthi yutāḥ tu agredeśe kūrccaḥ iha ucyate
ādhāra śaktim ārabhya pīṭha mantra mayam yajet
adhas kūrcca śilā ārūḍhām śarad candra nibha prabhām
ādhāra śaktim prayajet paṅkaja dvaya dhāriṇīm
mūrdhni tasyāḥ samāsīnam kūrmam nīla ābham arccayet
ūrddhva brahma śilā āsīnam anantam kunda sannibham
yajet cakradharam murdhni dhārayantam vasundharām
tamāla śyāmalām tatra nīla indīvara dhāriṇīm
samarccayet vasumatīm sphurat sāgara mekhalām
tasyām ratna mayam dvīpam tasmin ca maṇi maṇḍapam
yajet kalpatarum tasmin sādhaka abhīṣṭa siddhi dam
adhastāt pūjayet tasya vedikām maṇḍala ujjvalām
paścāt abhyarccayet tasyām pīṭham dharma ādibhiḥ punar
rakta śyāma haridrā indranīla ābhān pāda rūpiṇaḥ
vṛṣakeśa vibhūta indra rūpān dharma ādikān yajet
gātreṣu pūjayet tān tu nañ pūrvān ukta lakṣaṇān
āgneya ādiṣu koṇeṣu dikṣu madhya imbujam yajet
sarva tattva ātmakam padmam abhyarcya tad anantaram
mantrī prakṛti patrāṇi vikāra maya keśarān
pañcāśat varṇa vīja āḍhya karṇikām pūjayet tatas
kalābhiḥ pūjayet sārddham tasyām sūryya indu pāvakān
praṇavasya tribhiḥ bhāgaiḥ atha sattva ādikān guṇān
ātmānam antarātmānam paramātmānam arccayet
jñāna ātmānam ca vidhivat pīṭha mantra avasānakam
pīṭha śaktīḥ keśareṣu madhye ca sa vara abhayāḥ
hema ādi racitam kumbham mantra adbhiḥ kṣālita antaram
candana aguru karpūra dhūpitam śobhana ākṛtim
āveṣṭita aṅgam nīrandhram tantunā triguṇa ātmanā
arccitam gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ kurcca akṣata samanvitat
navaratna udaram mantrī sthāpayet tāram uccaran

original: aikyaṃ saṅkalpya kumbhasya pīṭhasya ca vidhānavit |

original: p. 258) daśavahneḥ kalāḥ pūrvaṃ dvādaśa dvādaśātmanaḥ |

arghyam diśet tatas mūrddhni śiromantreṇa deśikaḥ

ṣaḍaṅga yuvatīḥ paścāt pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ
netram agre diśām vastram dhyātavyāni aṅga devatāḥ

evam sampūjya vidhivat naivedya antam tatas guruḥ

avaśiṣṭena haviṣā vikiret paritas balim

original: uktaṃ kalādhvā tattvādhvā bhuvanādhveti ca trayam |
